website_summaries.verdict: Despite some shortcomings in the design and comfort department, the Panasonic RP-HX40s deliver impressive sound for the money and are a good value at around $20 online.
pros: The Panasonic RP-HX40s are lightweight on-ear headphones that look fairly attractive (they come in multiple colors), are inexpensive, have a built-in microphone for making cell phone calls, and sound very good for their low price point
cons: The RP-HX40s feel like inexpensive headphones and aren't incredibly comfortable (they could use a bit of padding in the headband)

customer_reviews.title: Good little headphones, but only for limited time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as I wanted some lightweight headphones to use while working long hours with my hands. After about an hour, these hurt. I tried to figure it out, and there is no cushioning rim of support around the earpad, but rather it presses directly onto your ear. This is fine for casual use, or perhaps if you don't wear glasses (I do). But for longer hours of listening, I wouldn't recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: LetterPress

customer_reviews.title: An excellent pair of headphones for its price
customer_reviews.text: For $20, I must admit I expected much less from this pair of headphones. Awesome. In the process of trying out different headphones configurations, I previously bought both theandalong with the,, and lossless audio files, and honestly, the $200 difference isn't worth it. (Even though the HD598 sounded wonderful on my digital piano, the pair of headphones and its plug were sooo bulky. The M50 had awesome isolation, but was extremely bulky as well.) This pair is light, looks futuristic, and the sound quality is more than acceptable. Thus, I'll probably stick with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Aeon

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable :(
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking pair of headphones with a decent sound quality, but I didn't like it much cuz it wasn't very comfortable. The headphone is too tight and the ear cushions are too thin that you can easily feel the plastic inside, which could hurt your ears if you were thinking about using them for hours non-stop. I could use my other headphone JVC-HA-S650 for hours together and it would feel like cotton on my ears. The JVC also had a very well balanced response. I think I'm going to return this Panasonic cuz its not very comfortable, even though it looks great and sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, though sometimes people cannot hear me clearly ...
customer_reviews.text: They work adequately. Good sound, though sometimes people cannot hear me clearly if I'm on my cellphone (I have an academic editing business and teach part time so I'm often having to talk to clients or students). It may be my cellphone! I searched high and low for headphones with no memory foam because I'm deadly allergic to the stuff (migraines, body aches, and severe eye reactions). The trade off is, of course, comfort. The pads are really hard, so I can't say they are the most comfortable headphones I've had. Still, overall, I'm happy with the sound when I'm listening to films on my computer or Audible books on my phone or tablet. [...]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors
customer_reviews.text: I am a musician and use this when working with music apps on my tablet and to evaluate mixes. The sound seems pretty accurate and not tainted by a consumer curve. This means if you want enormous bass and punchy mids these might not be for you, but if you want the flat-line truth about your mix, these can deliver. They aren't really loud headphones, and they do not block out the noise. They are comfortable and stylish. I think for the very specific purposes I have mentioned they are ideal!
customer_reviews.author: Irish Blood English Heart

customer_reviews.title: Rather Dashing headphones
customer_reviews.text: So these were a gift to somebody and she loves em! Says they are stylish and sound great. She said she looks rather dashing in them so I'm glad they at least look good. I love good sounding headphones and don't think these are the best quality sounding pair but for the price and average user who isn't looking for a 5 star sound then these will get the job done. One little disappointment is she says they don't stay on her head sometimes. I guess they wobble a bit when doing physical activity which is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto G.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, which was a big selling point for me. I can't wear bud earphones, so I was looking for on ear ones...saw these, read the reviews and decided to get them and I am very happy with my decision. They arrived this morning and tried them with my laptop this afternoon. They're hip and cool looking with a great colour selection (I choose the black with pink) without being too "young or out there" for this grandmother. They're lightweight, and the padded head rest is a plus. The sound was really clear. The rectangular ear covers are a bit unusual and may take some getting used to but overall I give them a big thumbs up,
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are perfect for my needs. The build quality is sturdy enough to last a few months in a backpack with a tablet, small books, and other stuff. The sound quality is definitely above average with clear mids/highs and the bass isn't muddy. And my daughter really loves the pink look while also being sophisticated enough to be seen in public.
customer_reviews.author: C. File

customer_reviews.title: These are now my back up pair. Sound is ...
customer_reviews.text: These are now my back up pair. Sound is okay but they hurt my ears with prolonged use. I am in the gym for 1.5 hours and the pressure and rectangular shape hurts the outside of my ears.
customer_reviews.author: NMMountainGrl

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THESE HEADPHONES THEY ARE DEFECTIVE.
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THESE HEADPHONES THEY ARE DEFECTIVE. My first pair lasted 1 1/2 years then the sound just stopped in one of the speakers. I thought I had done something wrong. Purchased a 2nd pair and they lasted 1 week. Numerous people have had the same problem. Do the research. Numerous people have had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Guglielmi

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I read about them with the topic : Top 5 under $20 headphones. I have Bose and Sennheiser, even the earpods, but I have to tell that these headphones sounds very good to be a cheap ones. I can not give 5 because they are not excellent, but I can guarantee that the sound is close to the excellent. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones, Be Careful When Working Out
customer_reviews.text: The ears collect sweat and feel uncomfortable when wet. Otherwise, great for their price. Good sound quality, and can be worn for more than 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown Entity

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one for my 8yr old son and one for my 10yr old daughter for their iPods. They have great sound although you should note that they do not have a volume limit for kids so we had to lock the volume on their iPods because the headphones produce a lot of sound. They are very comfortable for the kids and my husband and I have tried them too. Overall we're very happy
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: great lightweight headphones
customer_reviews.text: the cord is decently long enough that i rarely get them pulled off, the look is awesome and sharp. They feel like they are barley there on the head and don't hurt my head or ears one bit. The ear pieces are nice that they tilt around and they can then angle more appropriately for an ear. Sound is great for general listening, my only issues is they seem to like to slide down a bit not sure why, Just ordered the same ones for my husband so i would recommend them for anyone looking for non ear bud headphones.
customer_reviews.author: limegreenartist

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and wont stay put.
customer_reviews.text: Covering on earpieces is slippery and shifts around on ears while wearing them. Tension is a bit high on the band as well causing the earpieces to apply more pressure than is comfortable. Sound is OK... but I cant stand wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: William Pitt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent working headphones
customer_reviews.text: In my personal opinion, these headphones are the best value on the market. I work in an office and enjoy listening to music while I work. Unfortunately, many earbuds cause discomfort after long periods of use and other on-ear or over the ear headphones either drown out outside conversation, or can be heard by others. This pair allow me to hear the sounds outside of my cubicle and still enjoy my music. However, the headphones are not that securely on my ears, but that isn't a problem as I don't move around very much when working.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Woo

customer_reviews.title: Unique and Functional
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones. They fold absolutely flat, which was important to me on a space-saving basis for an equipment case. Be aware, though, that the earpads are convex, and sit on your ears a bit strangely. I use them for live broadcast monitoring. For serious music listening, many would be more comfortable with a traditional earcup. But, if space and weight are important to you, these are just fine. They look good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Booker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound. Moderate comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my use, listening to streaming material on the computer. Excellent sound reproduction. However, after an hour, or even less, they become uncomfotable. For the price they are a bargain. Just take a break occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: nuke

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Nearly a Five Star revue. Excellent sounding headphones for the price. I read that Panasonic has discontinued the model. If true, too bad. Their sound rivals (not quite matches) a $200 set of Sennheisers that I own.
customer_reviews.author: John C Grant

customer_reviews.title: They are NICE!
customer_reviews.text: THey were very nice and came within the week. I was happy that I bought them at the amazing price of $14.00. There are only two things that I am a little idssapointed in: THey are a bit smaller than i expected, so that's my fault, and they are sometimes hard to keep on, which could also be due to my big head. The sound is fine thought. THe only complaint is that if you like to turn up your music a bit louder, the sound can be heard by everybody around you. If this is the case, there is another pair of panasonic headphones that would be better for you.
customer_reviews.author: Dalt

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is fine, most uncomfortable headphones I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would be some stylish, comfortable headphones with relatively good sound quality. I was right about A and C, but B is the real problem. I can barely sit on my computer listening to music or watching a show without these things hurting my ears. I wouldn't recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: LaetitiaR

customer_reviews.text: Decent headphones, but they bleed sound like no other, if you're okay with everyone around you hearing what you're listening to, then these are fines
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: worked great for my grand daughter
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a cheap headset and if they came up broke or missing, I would not be out of a lot of money. I was wrong. My grand kids are taking good care of them and WOW... They sound good enough for me to use for myself. Thanks for this great sleeper set of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Rolling

customer_reviews.title: Good except for fit
customer_reviews.text: They look good and sound good but can't get them to stay in one place when moving around. The ear pads rotate, which is great for storing them, but they tend to slide on my ears as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from small Phones!
customer_reviews.text: When I received these headphones, I was excited about their compactibility only. I wasn't sure about the sound, but thought to myself "an inexpensive pair will do." When I put these headphones on, I was pleasantly suprised to find that they produced a strong, full-bodied sound that filled my ears with a balanced bouquet of sound. If you enjoy broad sound in a small package, you'll love these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: which is great, but the fit was too loose because of ...
customer_reviews.text: Minimal sound blocking, which is great, but the fit was too loose because of the convex pads. They work, but just not enough for a handful of stars.
customer_reviews.author: C. Capeland

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of headphones I've ever had. My first pair lasted a good three years. So sad that they've apparently been discontinued. Only problem is the lack of volume control dial.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They might be great for some but not at all for my kids...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good looking Inexpensive Cons: Very poor fit. They slide off my daughter's ears and head too easily. Mediocre sound quality They got returned.
customer_reviews.author: Long Island Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old. I like that they sit on top of his ears. They fit great for his age and he loves them and uses them all the time. I would buy this item again if I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Good sound; Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So uncomfortable, that I tried to give them away for free and had no takers. Sound, however, is good. Spend more and get the JBL J55
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Kagan

customer_reviews.title: good low cost headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a light weight and very portable headphone for travel. These fit the purpose nicely and I have money left to buy an MP3 player to go with them The fit is firm. They sound very good, too.
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: she loves the panasonic
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter tried these on the night she received them and was thrilled by how good they were. She is at college and needs them to block out noise so she can study
customer_reviews.author: artsmart

customer_reviews.title: Not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: They look great - love the color, but the ear pieces are really stiff so it doesnt sit comfortably on top of my head. its a little uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be okay. Bought them for my wife and she has used them without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Michael  C

customer_reviews.title: I love the balance on these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the balance on these headphones. They deliver a nice and smooth bass. They're super uncomfortable, but I can't ask for too much considering how cheap they are.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Prophet

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! Poor performance, terrible sound quality, uncomfortable to wear, do not recommend at all. panasonic you should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: miaminights

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones and light, ie compared to more expensive ones you see advertised. They actually look better than the more expensive ones, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fisch

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement For Ear Buds
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you would expect for an inexpensive pair of headphones. I can't do earbuds do to sensitive ears and these are soft and comfy against my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Parton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are perfect. I never liked the headphones that cup your ear and I don't care for ear buds either. These were made for me.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Stith

customer_reviews.title: Confortable headphone
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, nice offert, its feel pretty good on my ear!. Panasonic is a good brand for headphone, very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Lorena Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphone
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphone for the price although amazon carries a Panasonic headphone set for under $5 that sounds just as good.
customer_reviews.author: MFP

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my 15 year old daughter. She really likes them so I am calling them well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Hawgfan

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I borrow these from my daughter all the time they sound so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good but you can hear the sound when child is listening
customer_reviews.author: Brent Henning

customer_reviews.title: SWEET SOUNDS.
customer_reviews.text: THESE PANASONIC HEADPHONES ARE A SWEET DEAL AND THEY SOUND GREAT. AND THE COLOR WAS RIGHT ON TIME, HAD TO HAVE.
customer_reviews.author: Dedrick

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. She uses these to listen to her ipad. She hasn't complained. They seem to be comfortable and of decent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: bkingp

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones every day at work. They are very comfortable and produce good sound quality for casual listening.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was fast and it's a great product.Girl uses them with her piano on a daily basis. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: poor sound quality and very awkward to use, they keep slipping off your ears
customer_reviews.author: cheif8

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very picky about how she wanted her headphones to look. She is happy and they work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but do not stay on your ears.
customer_reviews.text: The sound was pretty good, but not the best. They feel comfortable but you can't move your head or they will slip off. Sound leakage is a big issue with these headphones. Over all rating: mehhh.
customer_reviews.author: r.Adams

customer_reviews.title: packing good, sound very good
customer_reviews.text: Shipment came fast, packing good, sound very good; very pleased
customer_reviews.author: jack taggart

customer_reviews.title: decent aesthetically but not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: Ordered several pairs for a tradeshow, decent aesthetically but not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: John Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: And the fabric material isn't that great. It gets easily dirty in addition to the poor sound quali. E shipper got it here on time though
customer_reviews.author: NM
